comment: A dank, funky nose like an old writing desks steers this Teeling release off the typical fruity path of its limited editions. There’s a distinct flavor of chestnuts and mushrooms on the palate, balanced by a lovely sweetness. The finish is long and zesty. Curiously tasty.

Drammers club online pour. Great stuff. Chestnut oak adds some nice caramel and chocolate sweetness and a nuttiness to the classic Teeling tropical fruit with a hint of
Blue cheese added on. 


Nose: Mango, Passion Fruit, Vanilla, Caramel, Chocolate, Hazlenuts, Cashews, Almonds, Blue Cheese, Pineapple, Honey, Coconut, Raisins, Green Apples, Walnuts, Chestnuts, Orange, Guava, Cheesecake, Mint

Palate: Caramel, Chocolate, Passion Fruit, Toffee, Honey, Apricot, Raisins, Oak, Pepper, Cinnamon, Citrus, Mango

Finish: Citrus, Mango, Pineapple, Caramel, Chocolate, Almonds, Hazlenuts, Passion Fruit
